@notice get Dao informations
 @return DaoSettings informations of the dao

params._isExclusive: if the type module can have multiple module

returns._0: array of module, module type & code hash see >/Data.sol

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

moduleType.details: moduleType: mapping of module identifier and hashed type module

modules.details: mapping of modules array by hashed type module

addModule(bytes8,bytes8,address,bool).notice: add new module to the Dao

getModuleData(bytes8).notice: get array of all module from a certain type

getModuleDataByIndex(bytes8,uint256).notice: get module info from a certain type from a specific index

moduleType(uint256).notice: store module types by module identifier

modulesTypeCount().notice: counter of modules of the dao

visibility().notice: indicates if dao is visible by not members

userdoc.notice: DaoBase represents a DAO, deployed by DaosFactory to create a new dao. DaoBase store general infos and all the modules references for the dao
